title: Frontend Developer (React)
description: Develop responsive UIs using modern React ecosystem. Requires 3+ years experience with TypeScript and state management.

title: UX Research Specialist
description: Conduct user research and translate insights into design improvements. Proficiency in Figma and user testing tools required.

title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer
description: Design and maintain AWS/GCP infrastructure. Terraform and Kubernetes experience required.

title: Technical Product Manager
description: Lead cross-functional teams in developing AI-powered SaaS products. PMP certification preferred.

title: Digital Marketing Lead
description: Develop and execute multi-channel marketing campaigns. Strong analytics background required.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build and deploy ML models using Python/TensorFlow. Experience with NLP systems preferred.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor network security and implement threat prevention measures. CISSP certification required.

title: Sales Engineering Lead
description: Technical pre-sales role supporting enterprise SaaS solutions. Requires strong presentation skills.

title: Technical Writer
description: Create API documentation and developer guides. Experience with Swagger/OpenAPI required.

title: AR/VR Developer
description: Develop immersive experiences using Unity/Unreal Engine. Portfolio required.

title: HR Technology Specialist
description: Implement and optimize HRIS systems. Workday certification preferred.

title: QA Automation Engineer
description: Build test automation frameworks using Selenium/Cypress. CI/CD pipeline experience required.
